author: ate
msg: JS2-1251: Add support for partly or fully readonly mapping (Ldap) backend:
- configurable global readonly state on mapping SecurityEntityManager (DefaultLDAPEntityManager)
- configurable allowed create/update/delete operations on entity type level
- configurable allowed create/delete operations on entity relation type level

msg: HADOOP-7214. Add Common functionality necessary to provide an equivalent of /usr/bin/groups for Hadoop. Contributed by Aaron T. Myers.
